title: Convection Currents in the Mantle
description: Learn Convection Currents in the Mantle in one minute.

hook.text: Heat rises. In a pot of soup, you can see hot liquid circling upward. Earth does the same.

buildup.text: Deep in the mantle, hot rock slowly rises. At the top it cools and sinks again.

discovery.text: These convection currents drag the tectonic plates sitting above them.

climax.text: But over millions of years, that slow flow rearranges entire continents.
